column1: More than 225K Americans have died from COVID-19.  This guy continues to say the pandemic is a hoax?  Vote. Him. Out.
Trump just pulled the plug on COVID-19 relief package negotiations.  On November 3.  The American people must pull the plug on him.  Vote Biden-Harris.
Joe Biden tests negative for coronavirus.  After possible exposure during presidential debate.   God is good.
More than 6 million Americans have now been infected by the coronavirus.  The pain suffering and death is out of control.  White House response has been an unmitigated disaster.  Free Dr. Fauci.

More than 175000 people have died on his watch.  Almost 6 million infected by the coronavirus.  Over 100 million Americans w/ pre-existing conditions at risk of grave consequences.  Trump is the bodyguard of Western Civilization?

Florida sets new one day national record for #coronavirus infections.  Republicans still plan massive political convention in Jacksonville.   Nothing Matters.  Senator Bob Corker said it (I didn’t).  Cult?
Coronavirus cases exploding in Texas and Florida.  Wait.  I thought this was a Blue State problem.

So-called President threatening to withhold #coronavirus relief from Michigan unless it bends the knee to King Donald.  House Impeachment Managers told the Senate this would happen.  @SenatorCollins & others refused to listen.  They unleashed this abuse of power on America.

More than one million Americans infected with the #coronavirus.  The economy is spiraling toward a depression.  And Mitch McConnell says he doesn’t feel the urgency of acting immediately.  It’s time to REPEAL and REPLACE the #DoNothingSenate.
The White House is now a #coronavirus Petri Dish.  And some think this administration can rescue America from the pandemic?  They can’t even save themselves.  https://t.co/T6egV9cUXr

Bernie endorsed Uncle Joe.  The stakes are high.  YES - There is a difference between Biden and Trump.   Does anyone reasonably think Secretary Clinton would have blown the COVID-19 response?  Trump. Must. Be. Defeated.  https://t.co/ZmstFgdOH8

Criticizing experienced public servants as “establishment” is vapid.   The shallowness of the critique has been exposed during the #coronavirus pandemic.  Who’d you rather have governing now:  The experienced Andrew Cuomo or a TV actor like the poser in the White House?  FACTS. https://t.co/JunLhHMKND

That man viciously attacked the Michigan Gov at his fake WH briefing as “That Woman.”  She has a name Donald.  GRETCHEN WHITMER.  Gov. Whitmer is fighting hard for all Michiganders staring down the #coronavirus.  And unlike you she was elected w/o the help of the Russians.
The American people need immediate relief from the #Coronavirus pandemic.  Massie is a Trump Republican.  Get your people in line Donald! https://t.co/Cm5VTjxZox

We’re in the middle of a global pandemic.  The so-called President has repeatedly lied to the American people.  He just spent time attacking the news media during a #Coronavirus press conference.  What a national disgrace.  #RememberInNovember
